amendment.description: To prohibit funds appropriated under title I from being used for earmarks until all structurally deficient and functionally obsolete bridges have been repaired, with limited exceptions.

Amendment SA 2810 proposed by Senator Coburn. (consideration: CR S11364-11367, S11378-11381, S11394-11396; text: CR S11364-11365) To prohibit funds appropriated under title I from being used for earmarks until all structurally deficient and functionally obsolete bridges have been repaired, with limited exceptions.
